meanings.definition: The quality of being directed towards a specific goal or purpose.
meanings.sent1: Her directednesses in achieving her dreams inspired everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: The team's directednesses towards winning the championship was evident in their hard work.
meanings.sent3: His directednesses in finding the perfect pizza toppings made him a legend in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The directednesses of the river towards the ocean symbolized the unstoppable force of nature.
meanings.sent5: The directednesses of the arrow towards the target was flawless, hitting the bullseye every time.

meanings.definition: The state of being guided or managed in a particular direction.
meanings.sent1: The directednesses of the students towards success was clear in their dedication to studying.
meanings.sent2: Under the directednesses of the coach, the team improved their performance significantly.
meanings.sent3: The directednesses of the cat towards the laser pointer provided endless entertainment for the family.
meanings.sent4: The directednesses of the wind towards the kite allowed it to soar high in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The directednesses of the ants towards the food source was impressive to observe.
